item.title: Getting to ‘no': Europe’s leaders find a way to speak with one voice against Trump - AP News
item.description: Getting to ‘no’: Europe’s leaders find a way to speak with one voice against Trump AP News’The damage has been done’: As Trump claims victory on Greenland, Europe loses trust NBC NewsThe Stillbirth of the Nationalist International The American ProspectEurope Is Entering the Age of Humiliation Bloomberg.comThe strategy Europe used to save Greenland from Trump vox.com
